tasks: Flat-state geometry of cylindrical surface intersections
methods: Closed-form solution for orthogonal cross section of two cylinders
title:
A closed-form solution for the flat-state geometry of cylindrical
  surface intersections bounded on all sides by orthogonal planes
abstract: A closed-form solution for the boundary of the flat state of an orthogonal cross section of contiguous surface geometry formed by the intersection of two cylinders of equal radii oriented in dual directions of rotation about their intersecting axes.
